title: Peasants at the Market
marks: Signature and Date bottom edge, right, in the print: [A D]; top cente
description: standing man wearing tunic and cloth boots, with PR arm outstretched; woman carrying a bundle of sticks (or arrows?) on her back, holding a chicken by the feet in her PL hand, places her PR hand in man\'s outstretched hand; jug and basket with eggs, LLC
creditline: Gift of Peter R. Spokes in memory of C.C. and Beecher Hogan
